summary: All he wanted was to see her just once. Manu was from a village in the backwoods. Neeru was the girl next door, his lost love.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Annu Kapoor|Mouli Ganguly|Pradip Adhikari|Kailash Koppikar|Kameshwar Mishra|Dilip Patra|Surekha Sikri|Sameer Dharmadhikari|Gulzar
title: Raincoat
